title: Introduction to React Development
description: Learn the fundamentals of React including components, state management, and modern development practices. Perfect for beginners looking to build interactive web applications.

modules.title: Getting Started with React
modules.content: Introduction to React concepts and setup

modules.title: Components and JSX
modules.content: Understanding React components and JSX syntax

modules.title: State and Props
modules.content: Managing component state and passing data with props

title: Advanced JavaScript Concepts
description: Deep dive into advanced JavaScript topics including closures, prototypes, async programming, and ES6+ features for experienced developers.

modules.title: Closures and Scope
modules.content: Understanding JavaScript closures and lexical scoping

modules.title: Prototypes and Inheritance
modules.content: JavaScript prototype chain and object-oriented programming

modules.title: Async Programming
modules.content: Promises, async/await, and event loop mechanics

title: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
description: Master the principles of user interface and user experience design. Learn design thinking, wireframing, prototyping, and user research methodologies.

modules.title: User Research Methods
modules.content: Conducting user interviews and usability testing

title: Database Design and SQL
description: Comprehensive course on relational database design, SQL queries, normalization, and database optimization techniques for modern applications.

modules.title: Database Fundamentals
modules.content: Introduction to relational databases and RDBMS concepts

modules.title: SQL Queries and Joins
modules.content: Writing complex SQL queries and understanding table relationships

modules.title: Database Optimization
modules.content: Indexing, query optimization, and performance tuning

title: Digital Marketing Strategy
description: Learn modern digital marketing techniques including SEO, social media marketing, content strategy, and analytics to grow your business online.

modules.title: SEO Fundamentals
modules.content: Search engine optimization techniques and best practices

modules.title: Social Media Marketing
modules.content: Building brand presence across social platforms

modules.title: Analytics and Metrics
modules.content: Measuring and analyzing marketing campaign performance

title: Machine Learning Basics
description: Introduction to machine learning algorithms, data preprocessing, model training, and evaluation using Python and popular ML libraries.

modules.title: ML Fundamentals
modules.content: Introduction to machine learning concepts and types

modules.title: Data Preprocessing
modules.content: Cleaning and preparing data for machine learning models

modules.title: Model Training and Evaluation
modules.content: Training ML models and evaluating their performance
